001package ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.net;
002
003import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.FlowAssembler;
004import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.net.ByteStream;
005import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.net.TcpSegment;
006import java.util.Optional;
007
008/**
009 * Flow assembler implementation that never emits data. Useful for disabling flow assembly while
010 * still satisfying the {@link FlowAssembler} contract.
011 *
012 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
013 */
014public final class NoOpFlowAssembler implements FlowAssembler {
015  /**
016   * Creates a no-op flow assembler.
017   *
018   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
019   */
020  public NoOpFlowAssembler() {}
021
022  /**
023   * Returns {@link Optional#empty()} for every segment.
024   *
025   * @param segment segment ignored by this assembler; may be {@code null}
026   * @return always {@link Optional#empty()}
027   * @implNote Does not inspect the segment to avoid additional allocations.
028   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
029   */  @Override
030  public Optional<ByteStream> accept(TcpSegment segment) {
031    return Optional.empty();
032  }
033}
034
